programme.desc: Filled with foot-tapping numbers and mind-blowing dance sequences is 'ABCD: Anybody Can Dance', a dance film which witnesses ace choreographer Remo donning the role of director. Brilliant dancers like Prabhudheva and Ganesh Acharya team up with seasoned actors like Kay Kay Menon in this one-of-a-kind blockbuster which tracks the rise of a choreographer who trains people from the streets to take part in a professional dance competition. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Himmatwala
programme.desc: The official remake of Himmatwala (1983), this movie revolves around Ravi, who returns to Ramnagar from the city to his mother Savitri and sister Padma. Learning that Sher Singh, the local zamindar, caused his father's death, Ravi tries to kill Sher Singh but fails. Padma is in love with Sher Singh's manager Narayan Das's son, Shakti. Sher Singh and Narayan Das plot to use this to their advantage, but by falling in love with Ravi, will Rekha, Sher Singh's daughter, turn the tables around. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Once Upon Ay Time in Mumbai Dobaara!

programme.desc: Seshadri (Dharmendra) gets an offer to make a fortune in four days. He teams up four people who are up for it as this deal will catapult them into the big league. The youngest member of the gang Vikram (Neil Nitin Mukesh) plans to disappear to some unknown city and start his own life with his love Mini (Rimi Sen), when a devilish thought crosses his mind. What if he grabs the entire jackpot? Vikram's opening gambit is a neat double cross. But as he plunges further into his diabolical plan he realizes that the stakes in this game are high. And the only losers he can afford to leave behind are dead ones. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
programme.desc: Johnny Depp reprises his iconic role as the constantly flinching, smirking and cunning pirate, Captain Jack Sparrow, in the fourth installation of the Pirates of the Caribbean series, which is directed by Rob Marshall. Jack and Captain Barbossa set out on a journey to find the legendary fountain of youth. But he must face the fearsome pirate Blackbeard and his enigmatic daughter Angelica, who are also in search of the fountain. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: King Of The Streets
programme.desc: A petty drug dealer is looking for a big break. He shares his dreams and his heart with a prostitute as they look towards a better life. Their prayers get answered when an opportunity comes knocking. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: When Woody is toy-napped by a greedy toy collector and is nowhere to be found, Buzz and his friends set out to rescue him. But Woody too is tempted by the idea of becoming immortal in a museum. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Monster Hunt 2
programme.desc: (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Home Alone 3
programme.desc: Alex is a little boy who makes life miserable for a bunch of thieves who secretly plan to fund a North Korean terrorist group. They are after one of Alex's toys in which they have hidden a small chip. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: Set in an alternate universe where both dinosaurs and humans exist, this animated adventure follows the unlikely friendship between Arlo, an Apatosaurus, and a feral caveboy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Cars 2
programme.desc: (Film - Animation)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Each of the three teams must cook the same six dishes and will be judged in comparison to the dishes made by their counterparts. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: War For The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: When a rogue army of humans kills Caesar's wife and son, he sets out to exact revenge. But his quest for retribution reveals his darker instincts even as he makes a startling discovery. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Master Z: Ip Man Legacy
programme.desc: A disgraced martial artist's simple life is disturbed when he inadvertently fights a group of drug dealers. As the conflict deepens, several people around him are threatened. As a result, he is forced to rise against a very powerful and dangerous drug lord. (Film - Action)

programme.title: League of Gods
programme.desc: (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Undisputed
programme.desc: An action movie that narrates the story of a heavyweight champion called George Iceman Chambers who lands in prison where the resident gangster arranges a boxing match with the reigning prison champion. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: Mercenaries William and Tovar are imprisoned in the Great Wall by a faction called the Nameless Order, which battles alien monsters that attack every sixty years. Once there, William ends up befriending Lin, a young commander, and decides to assist the Nameless Order in accomplishing their selfless mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Gone In Sixty Seconds
programme.desc: Memphis Raines, a former prisoner, returns to the crime world to save Kip's life when he learns that his brother faces threat from gangster Raymond Calitri. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the 12 ancient animal signs of the 'Chinese Zodiac' stolen, Asian Hawk, brought to life by the phenomenal Jackie Chan who also doubles up as the director of this adrenaline-pumping action film, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. Accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady, Hawk bears it all to emerge successful in this film, which is known to be the third highest grosser in China and also earned two Guinness World Records. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Having earned himself a reputation, Van Helsing is a monster hunter known to destroy all forms of evil. His latest mission is in Transylvania where he teams up with Anna to defeat Count Dracula. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Mufasa, the noble lion king of the Pride Lands of Africa, is killed trying to save his young son from a trap set by his evil brother Scar. He then declares himself king and tries to kill Simba. However, Simba escapes and grows up in the company of outcasts Timon and Pumbaa, a meerkat and warthog. Years later, Simba has a chance encounter with Nala the lioness who urges him to return to the pride and take his rightful place as the king. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: Director genius Matthew Vaughn brings a boisterous and visually engaging tale portraying the origins of the mutant community, packed with talented stars like James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Nicholas Hoult, Jennifer Lawrence and January Jones. Set in the backdrop of the Cuban Missile Crisis in 1962, a group of X-men discover their bizarre and formidable powers, which helps them fight against the ruthless dictator who's waiting to wage a war against the man- and mutant-kind. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Night At The Museum: Secret Of The Tomb
programme.desc: The endearing museum security guard Larry Daley discovers that the Tablet of Ahkmenrah is corroding and the exhibits will not be able to come to life at night. After learning that the secret to restoring it lies with Ahkmenrah's parents, he sets out on a wild adventure across the globe to save the museum's precious inhabitants. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Each of the three teams must cook the same six dishes and will be judged in comparison to the dishes made by their counterparts. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: Starring action stalwarts Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger, the movie revolves around the exploits of a security system expert who is imprisoned in a high-tech prison and must figure out an ingenious way to escape. (Film - Action)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: An immensely powerful ancient mutant rises again and wishes to cleanse humankind in order to create a new world order. He recruits some powerful mutants, making them believe that mutants are superior to humans and it is their right to rule. To counter him, Raven tries to pull Charles out of his depressed state and lead a team of X-Men. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Glass Houses
programme.desc: Carrie Dawson is a teenage babysitter who learns about a humiliating family scandal and the person who is suspected to be the reason for it. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Johnny Gaddaar
programme.desc: Seshadri (Dharmendra) gets an offer to make a fortune in four days. He teams up four people who are up for it as this deal will catapult them into the big league. The youngest member of the gang Vikram (Neil Nitin Mukesh) plans to disappear to some unknown city and start his own life with his love Mini (Rimi Sen), when a devilish thought crosses his mind. What if he grabs the entire jackpot? Vikram's opening gambit is a neat double cross. But as he plunges further into his diabolical plan he realizes that the stakes in this game are high. And the only losers he can afford to leave behind are dead ones. (Film - Thriller)

While they try their best to get out of the ordeal, they discover that a few creatures belonging to an unidentified species are out to get them. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: Based on a Marvel Comics character, 'Ant-Man' has Paul Rudd playing the superhero whose suit gives him the power to shrink in size. He is tasked with using his abilities to stop Darren from creating a destructive weapon with the same technology. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Oh, a loveable misfit alien who is on the run from his own alien race, takes shelter on planet Earth and befriends Tip, an adventurous young girl who is on a quest to find her displaced mother Lucy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
programme.desc: In the wake of a calamity of epic proportions, Manny is separated from Ellie and Peached and is left with Diego, Sid and his grandmother on an iceberg. As they attempt to return to his family, the motley friends are apprehended by pirates. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
programme.desc: Percy Jackson, the son of Posedion, decides to uphold Thalia's sacrifice. Thalia had sacrificed herself to get the others into her camp and her father Zeus found another way for her to live by transforming her into a pine tree, creating a magical border around the camp so that no other half-blood would suffer from a fate as she did. For this, he embarks on a journey, with his friends Annabeth, Clarisse and half-brother, Tyson, to the Sea of Monsters to find the Golden Fleece which has the power to save their home and training ground, Camp Half-Blood. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: Grug and his family embark on a journey to search for a new place to live after their cave is destroyed. A young boy helps them trek through unknown places to find new shelter. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: Mercenaries William and Tovar are imprisoned in the Great Wall by a faction called the Nameless Order, which battles alien monsters that attack every sixty years. Once there, William ends up befriending Lin, a young commander, and decides to assist the Nameless Order in accomplishing their selfless mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: Gary 'Eggsy' Unwin, an unrefined but promising street kid, gets recruited and trained as an agent for a secret spy organisation. He goes through the organisation's gruelling training programme while a global threat emerges from an eccentric genius. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed IV
programme.desc: After he accidentally kills his opponent, underground fighter Yuri Boyka questions everything he stands for and tries to win the freedom of the dead man's wife through a series of fights. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Iron Man 2
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch And The Wardrobe
programme.desc: While playing, Lucy and her siblings find a wardrobe that lands them in a mystical place called Narnia. Here they realise that it was fated and they must now unite with Aslan to defeat an evil queen. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Cars 2
programme.desc: (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Recruit
programme.desc: James Clayton (Colin Farrell) is one of the top prospects in the new crop of CIA recruits. His intelligence and unconventional attitude attract the attention of veteran Walter Burke who squires him through the Agencys difficult training courses and helps him to quickly rise through the ranks. Clayton is then given a special assignment, to root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the Agency. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: The Game Plan
programme.desc: Unaware that he has an eight-year-old daughter, quarterback Joe Kingman transforms from an egotistical bachelor into a loving father when the child suddenly enters his life. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: After successfully completing graduation, Johnny Rico joins a military group and begins his training. Soon, he finds himself battling gigantic alien bug-like creatures who are on a mission to destroy Earth. (Film - Action)

programme.title: TRON: Legacy
programme.desc: Sam misses his father, a virtual world designer, and enters a virtual space that has become much more dangerous than his father intended. Now, both father and son embark upon a life-and-death journey. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: The film, which is a directorial debut of Joe Johnston, tells the story of an absent-minded inventor who leaves his latest creation, an electromagnetic shrinking machine, unattended in his attic. The machine shrinks his and his neighbour's kids to 1/4-th of an inch, when they accidentally trigger it. When the newly tiny youngsters are tossed out with the trash, they must survive the long journey across the lawn. (Film - Family)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.desc: Colin's promotion multiplies his power sources and weakens everything around him. Also, Nadja discovers Nandor's connection to her past while Colin bemoans his fate. (TV Show - Comedy)

programme.title: What We Do In The Shadows
programme.desc: A vengeful vampire arrives in Staten Island to collect the dues Laszlo owes him since the past 167 years. Laszlo then goes to Pennsylvania, where he masquerades as a bar owner and volleyball coach. (TV Show - Comedy)

programme.title: American Idol
programme.desc: Several participants from America showcase their singing talent in front of a panel of esteemed judges to win the title and a record label deal. (TV Show - Reality - Music)

programme.title: Snowfall
programme.desc: As the world comes crashing down around him, Franklin makes a decision that will affect the lives of those around him in more ways than one. (TV Show - Crime)

programme.title: American Idol
programme.desc: Several participants from America showcase their singing talent in front of a panel of esteemed judges to win the title and a record label deal. (TV Show - Reality - Music)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: Junior is excited about voting for the very first time. However, he is surprised to find that he has been purged from the voter rolls. (TV Show - Comedy)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: Dre is surprised when his colleague Stevens makes an ill-advised decision to run for United States Congress. (TV Show - Comedy)
Athena enlists the 118's help to tackle a speeding teenager. Meanwhile, a routine traffic stop leads to a shocking discovery. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: What We Do In The Shadows
programme.desc: Nadja heartily welcomes Simon the Devious while a suspicious Laszlo keeps an eye on him. Also, Colin exploits social media to inflame people and later confronts a troll. (TV Show - Comedy)

programme.title: What We Do In The Shadows
programme.desc: The song 'Come on Eileen' brings Lazlo a fresh wave of nostalgia and has him going through his old things. Later, Guillermo discovers a treachery while Lazlo and Nadja perform at a concert. (TV Show - Comedy)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group's plan to head for Fort Benning is put on hold when Sophia goes missing. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: Mortal Engines
programme.desc: In a post-apocalyptic world, cities ride on wheels and devour each other in order to survive. A woman named Hester Shaw rises to stop a large predator city and finds support in an outcast apprentice historian of London called Tom Natsworthy and a dangerous outlaw, Anna Fang. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: Lawyer Fletcher Reede (Jim Carrey) lies constantly, a habit thats decimated his marriage to Audrey (Maura Tierney) and threatens to alienate his son, Max (Justin Cooper). But when Max makes a birthday wish that somehow comes true, Fletcher suddenly finds hes incapable of lying which sends him into a panic as hes set to try a crucial case. Jennifer Tilly also stars in director Tom Shadyacs Golden Globe nominated comedy. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Having earned himself a reputation, Van Helsing is a monster hunter known to destroy all forms of evil. His latest mission is in Transylvania where he teams up with Anna to defeat Count Dracula. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Incredibles 2
programme.desc: When Elastigirl is called by Devtech to work on a project to change the public's perception towards superheroes, Mr Incredible is left in charge of the household. But looking after Dash, who is having trouble at school, Violet, who becomes withdrawn after her break-up, and baby Jack-Jack's ever-increasing array of abilities is a daunting task in itself. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: Aladdin, a kind-hearted street urchin, falls in love at the first sight of Princess Jasmine, the princess of Agrabah. When he stumbles upon a magic lamp, Aladdin uses the powers of the magical Genie to make himself a wealthy prince so that he can marry the princess. On the other hand, danger is lurking around Agrabah in the form of an evil sorcerer, Jafar. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: After successfully completing graduation, Johnny Rico joins a military group and begins his training. Soon, he finds himself battling gigantic alien bug-like creatures who are on a mission to destroy Earth. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Director Patrick Read Johnson's adventurous family comedy 'Baby's Day Out' narrates the story of three wannabe kidnappers, Eddie (Joe Mantegna), Norby (Joe Pantoliano) and Veeko (Brian Haley) disguise themselves as photographers, enter a huge mansion and make away with Baby Bink (Adam and Jacob Worton), millionaires Bennington (Matthew Glave) and Laraine (Lara Flynn Boyle) Cotwell's son. But Baby Bink turns out to be more than a hand full for the crooks. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: Turbo finds himself extraordinarily gifted after a freak accident endows him with the power of speed. He decides to compete in the world's fastest race, the Indianapolis 500. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Predator
programme.desc: An army ranger's autistic son accidentally triggers another attempt by the Predators to return to Earth and bond their DNA with inhabitants of the planet for their survival. The responsibility to prevent this attack from happening falls on the shoulders of a few former soldiers and a scientist. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: In this reboot of the 'The Mummy' franchise, Sergeant Nick Morton and Corporal Chris Vail uncover the mummy of the betrayed Princess Ahmanet, who unleashes mayhem across London in a bid to reclaim her destiny. (Film - Action)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: When a secret agent learns of his wife's extra-marital affair, he pursues her, while at the same time he tries to pin-down terrorists in possession of nuclear missiles. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Rule Of Three
programme.desc: A father repeatedly visits the motel room where his daughter was last seen before her abduction in the hope of solving the mystery and ultimately finding her. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The legendary Harrison Ford dons the role of the president of the United States of America, who journeys to Russia and speaks out against terrorism, in this action-packed film directed by the talented Wolfgang Petersen. Trepidation sets in when his family and he are taken as hostages while aboard the 'Air Force One' by those who are out to incite global terror forcing the President to rise to the occasion and combat the crisis at hand. (Film - Action)

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Flik, an odd ball of an ant, may be pint sized but he has tremendous courage. When the anthill he resides in is threatened by arrogant grasshoppers, he sets out to create an army to deal with them, recruiting the most incompetent bugs of course. A man with exceptional humour inducing skills, Dave Foley lends his voice to play Flik. Directors John Lasseter, and Andrew Stanton procure some of the biggest names on television and film for 'A Bug's Life'. Julia Louis-Dreyfuss, Kevin Spacey and Hayden Pannettiere are but a few. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Bobby Hayes and his aide Nick Walker, who work as detectives for the Boston Police Department, steal gold while they are on duty. Bobby kills Nick so that he doesn't return the booty to the officials during a raid. In the afterlife, Nick is hired by Mildred Proctor, the director of Rest In Peace Department (R.I.P.D.), a group of deceased police officers. Nick is assigned the responsibility to fight against the renegade ghosts. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Prince Of Persia: The Sands Of Time
programme.desc: With the help of a special, magical dagger that can help reverse time, a young prince and a princess must stop an evil villain whose actions threaten to destroy the world. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent is a kind-hearted fairy, who wants peace to prevail in the kingdom. She is deceived by the love of her life, Stefan, who wants to be the king. In a turn of events, he cuts her wings and is crowned the king. A scorned Maleficent is hell-bent on attaining justice in her own ways. When she realises that Stefan is blessed with a daughter, Aurora, she places a curse on her. She reveals that on her sixteenth birthday, she will prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel, which will cause her to fall into a deathlike sleep. Later, Maleficent realises that Aurora is the only one who can help restore peace in the kingdom and to her too. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Director Lee Unkrich's long time association with Pixar comes handy as he directs the Academy-award winning third instalment in the 3D computer animated comedy trilogy 'Toy Story'. With an ensemble cast consisting of actors like Tom Hanks and Tim Allen rendering their celebrated voiceovers, this visually appetising and emotionally enchanting animation takes viewers in the mysterious world of anthropomorphic toys Woody, Buzz and the gang, who find themselves in the company of untamed, uncivilised tots. Woody and Buzz must plan their great escape with the help of their newly found friends. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: Wade Wilson AKA Deadpool learns what it means to have a family as he attempts to save Russell, an orphaned mutant, who is being hunted by Cable, a genetically enhanced soldier from the future trying to prevent the death of his wife and daughter. (Film - Action)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Beauty And The Beast
programme.desc: Belle, a beautiful young woman, agrees to live with the Beast in exchange for the return of her abducted father. Soon, Belle discovers that her hideous captor is actually an enchanted prince. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Legendary assassin Jason Bourne uncovers mysteries of his past, which puts him in the cross-hairs of a superkiller. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Jason Bourne is forced to return to his old ways as an assassin when he is wrongly framed in a CIA operation. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy
programme.desc: Arthur Dent has just lost his perfect woman to another and as if that wasn't enough, his friend, who actually turns out to be an alien, informs him about Earth's impending doom. Soon, Arthur is whisked away from Earth seconds before it is exploded to make way for a new hyperspace motorway. Plus, there are other woes such as being wanted by the police, Earth II, an insane electronic encyclopaedia, the absences of tea and so on and so forth. But, Arthur's day is not entirely lost because he now stands a chance to win back his lady love while being on the greatest adventure off Earth. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Undisputed III: Redemption
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Upgrade
programme.desc: Grey, a technophobe, suffers paralysis and loses his wife during an attack. But when a billionaire hands him a chip in his body that restores his mobility, he sets out to get vengeance. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: In the spinoff of 2003 animated adventure movie, 'Finding Nemo', Dory, the forgetful tang fish, remembers her parents in a flashback. She ventures out on a journey to the Jewel of Morro Bay along with Merlin and Nemo. They encounter numerous struggles on the way until a childhood memory guides Dory home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent is a kind-hearted fairy, who wants peace to prevail in the kingdom. She is deceived by the love of her life, Stefan, who wants to be the king. In a turn of events, he cuts her wings and is crowned the king. A scorned Maleficent is hell-bent on attaining justice in her own ways. When she realises that Stefan is blessed with a daughter, Aurora, she places a curse on her. She reveals that on her sixteenth birthday, she will prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel, which will cause her to fall into a deathlike sleep. Later, Maleficent realises that Aurora is the only one who can help restore peace in the kingdom and to her too. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Underwater
programme.desc: Norah, a mechanical engineer, and her team must deal with an earthquake while they are working at the bottom of the Mariana Trench. While they try their best to get out of the ordeal, they discover that a few creatures belonging to an unidentified species are out to get them. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the 12 ancient animal signs of the 'Chinese Zodiac' stolen, Asian Hawk, brought to life by the phenomenal Jackie Chan who also doubles up as the director of this adrenaline-pumping action film, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. Accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady, Hawk bears it all to emerge successful in this film, which is known to be the third highest grosser in China and also earned two Guinness World Records. (Film - Action)

programme.title: John Carter
programme.desc: Based on the fantastical 'Barsoom' series by Edgar Rice Burroughs, this action adventure film follows the exploits of a courageous Civil War veteran, John Carter, who finds himself transported to a barren planet, Barsoom (Mars), when he touches a mysterious medallion. Once there, he finds himself in the middle of a conflict and is soon captured. With the superhuman strength he seems to have gained on the planet, is he meant to be the deliverer of peace in Barsoom. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A man with a bullet-ridden body is found and looked after by strangers. He wakes up to a blank memory and begins a journey to find out his identity. The road ahead is full of danger and conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Iron Man 2
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: Lucy, Edmund and Eustace are stranded in Cambridge. They return to Narnia where they meet Prince Caspian. He explains to them that in the while that they were away, the face of Narnia has changed. Together, they realise that their homeland is under threat from green mist. They set out to find Lord Telmar, a close confidante of Caspian's father, in order to restore peace. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: Popular stars Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, Miguel Ferrer and BD Wong lend their voices to recount a unique Chinese tale of a girl who takes an untrodden path of masquerading as a man just to save her land from the evil invaders. On gauging that her ailing father is in no position to defend his territory, 'Mulan' decides to take his place and lead her army to victory, but an unexpected company awaits her. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Based on the comic book series of the same name by the author Robert Kirkman, 'The Walking Dead' features the police officer Rick Grimes (Andrew Lincoln) who, along with his family and a bunch of other survivors, struggles to stay alive in a world ravaged by a zombie apocalypse. Some of the survivors, feeling overwhelmed by the pressure to stay alive, resort to barbaric behaviour, with Rick subsequently realising much to his dismay that the intense fear of the survivors can be more lethal than the zombies terrorising them. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: Bosch
programme.desc: Harry Bosch, a detective working with the Los Angeles Police Department, is accused of murdering a serial killer. At that time, he is simultaneously investigating the murder of a young boy. (TV Show - Crime)

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: An elite group of profilers analyse the nation's most dangerous criminal minds in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again. The team, the Behavioral Analysis Unit, is led by Aaron Hotchner, former prosecutor and one of the most experienced agents of the FBI. Assisting him are Derek Morgan, a hot-tempered cop; Dr. Spencer Reid, a genius with an IQ of 187; Jennifer Jareau, the Communications Liaison Officer and others. (TV Show - Crime)

programme.title: Fresh Off The Boat
programme.desc: During the 1990s, an immigrant Taiwanese family makes an attempt to adjust to the socio-cultural and socio-economic reality of living in the US. (TV Show - Sitcom)

programme.title: The Wonder Years

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Based on the comic book series of the same name by the author Robert Kirkman, 'The Walking Dead' features the police officer Rick Grimes (Andrew Lincoln) who, along with his family and a bunch of other survivors, struggles to stay alive in a world ravaged by a zombie apocalypse. Some of the survivors, feeling overwhelmed by the pressure to stay alive, resort to barbaric behaviour, with Rick subsequently realising much to his dismay that the intense fear of the survivors can be more lethal than the zombies terrorising them. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: Hote Hote Pyar Ho Gaya
programme.desc: Pinky and Atul alias Bunty are in love with each other, and plan to marry. They, however, run into opposition with their respective families, as their life-partners have already been picked for them. Pinky's dad, a retired Colonel has picked Police Inspector Arjun to be Pinky's groom; while Ajit and Asha, Bunty's dad and mom, have picked Shobha to be Bunty's bride. Both Bunty and Pinky plan to go through with their respective marriages to the partners of their parents' choices, and then eventually divorce them, and then get married to each other. They give in to their parents' choices, and their parents are delighted and both the weddings take place with great pomp and ceremony. Pinky then starts picking fights with Arjun and his mom, and openly insults them; while Bunty also does the same with Shobha. Their plans seem to be going on track, until they come to know that Shobha and Arjun are meeting on the sly. What impact will this have on their plans and their marriage? (Action,Crime,Romance)

programme.title: Zakhmi Sipahi
programme.desc: Shakti is an honest police officer out to avenge the death of his father, Gautam Gorakhnath, and the trials and obstacles he faces while he goes through corruption, love, and usual Hindi film masala. (Action)

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Dhadkan is about Anjali (Shilpa Shetty) who is a girl that hails from an extremely rich and influential family. Her father Mr. Chauhan (Kiran Kumar) is a renowned businessman and has many dreams for his daughter. But Anjali is in love with Dev (Sunil Shetty) who is very poor & often cannot even afford to clothe himself properly. Dev also loves Anjali, wants to marry her so has to meet her father. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Jurm
programme.desc: Police Inspector Shekhar Varma lives in Khar, Bombay, along with his wife, Meena, and a school-going daughter. His office is notified that Editor Ritesh Nandy has received death threats as he come across evidence that would expose some very influential people. (Crime,Romance)

programme.title: Asmaan Se Ooncha
programme.desc: Action - A longstanding feud between bitter rivals yields an unexpected friendship in this tale of ambition, violence and love starring Jeetendra and Raj Babbar. Engaged in an ongoing dispute with his archenemy, Nagraj, a man named King sets out to kill the police officer who's interfered in his affairs. But through a remarkable twist of fate, King and the cop end up friends. Now, the two must face the formidable Nagraj -- who wants them both dead. - Ajitesh, Sadashiv Amrapurkar, Raj Babbar (Family,Action,Drama)

programme.title: Shiva Shakti
programme.desc: Shiva travels to the city to earn money for his sister Kusum's marriage. He meets Shakti and they become friends. When Kusum gets pregnant with Shakti's child, Shiva vows to murder him. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Taqdeer Ka Tamasha
programme.desc: A single mother, Geeta, must deal with her two sons, the elder a Police Inspector Suryapratap; while the younger, Satya, a hoodlum, when both get into conflicts. Things only get worse after Satya gets arrested, arguments ensue and he leaves. He gets hired by Sheshnaag for the sole purpose of exacting vengeance against his rival, Deva. Both brothers are fated to meet again when Suryapratap decides to accumulate evidence to arrest Deva. Neither of the brothers know that Deva has an alias, and is determined to thwart any attempt for revenge nor face any charges under the Indian Penal Code. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Bhishma
programme.desc: Paro, her mother, and her brother, Natwar, find an unconscious man near their town. They bring him over to their house, nurse and nurture him back to good health, only to find out that he has the mind of a 12 year of old child, and name him Bhola. Years pass by, Paro has fallen in love with Bhola, for he rescued her from a molester, and both would like to get married. Before that could happen, Bhola is viciously attacked and left for dead by Paro's molester, and is hospitalized. While in hospital, Police Sub-Inspector Abhimanyu Verma finds out that Bhola is not who he claims to be but a homicidal maniac, wanted for killing three policemen - named Bhisma - and is possibly masquerading as a 12 year old child to hide from the police.

programme.title: Prithvi
programme.desc: A newly married couple go on their honeymoon to a foreign country, when the wife suddenly disappears. (Action)

programme.title: Loha
programme.desc: A well-meaning but disgraced cop, is determined to fight a corrupt system, taking to task miscreants and criminals in his city. (Action)

programme.title: Showbiz
programme.desc: Rohan Arya lives a wealthy lifestyle in Mumbai and is a professional singer with Showbiz, which is managed by Inder Raj Bahl, while Rohan's personal Manager is Shikha Verma. Rohan and Shikha are attracted to each other, and after Journalist Sharad Rajpoot publishes their photographs, both publicly announce their forthcoming engagement. Then chaos enters their lives when Rohan's car is involved in an accident while he is in the company of a prostitute named Tara. Shikha refuses to have to do anything with him, while a frenzied media focuses in on Rohan's personal life - especially after word gets out that he may have known Tara before he met Shikha. (Action,Crime,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Kasoor
programme.desc: The film starts with the murder of Priti (Divya Dutta), wife of Shekhar (Aftab Shivdasani), a well-known journalist. Inspector Lokhande (Ashutosh Rana) investigates the case and accuses Shekhar of the murder, saying he has enough evidences to arrest him. Upon getting bail from the court, Shekhar's lawyer tells him that he will not be able to fight his case because he is a corporate lawyer. He asks him to contact Simran Bhargav (Lisa Ray), who is a criminal lawyer to fight his case. (Drama,Mystery,Thriller)

programme.title: Apna Bana Ke Dekho
programme.desc: Jankiraman alias Johny is a hoodlum, known to the local police, has been arrested several times, and lives a poor lifestyle in a city in South India along with his widowed mom. His mother and father had a love marriage, but he died a violent death. She kept her Mangalsutra around his photo frame. Once she talked to a parrot astrologer, who predicted great things in Janikiraman's life, as he will soon be associating with rich people, as well as getting married to a very wealthy girl... (Drama)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: Movie. (Drama)

programme.title: Asmaan Se Ooncha
programme.desc: Action - A longstanding feud between bitter rivals yields an unexpected friendship in this tale of ambition, violence and love starring Jeetendra and Raj Babbar. Engaged in an ongoing dispute with his archenemy, Nagraj, a man named King sets out to kill the police officer who's interfered in his affairs. But through a remarkable twist of fate, King and the cop end up friends. Now, the two must face the formidable Nagraj -- who wants them both dead. - Ajitesh, Sadashiv Amrapurkar, Raj Babbar (Family,Action,Drama)

programme.title: 16 December
programme.desc: White collar crimes that drain the nation of precious foreign exchange is connected to the funding of international terrorism. The much-told Hollywood theme is retold in the Indian context with much needed technical wizadry. (Action,Thriller)

programme.title: Indra - The Tiger
programme.desc: Indra opens in a village in Andhra Pradesh showing the rivalry between two families. A police officer wishing to end this hostility comes up with the proposal of marriage between the two families which ultimately is used by Shivraj as a trap to finish off his rival. After the funeral, no one is willing to stake claim for the leadership of the clan when the young Indrasena Reddy comes in and tells his grandmother that he will. (Drama)

programme.title: Baadshah
programme.desc: K. Jhunjhunwala would like to locate his missing/runaway daughter, Seema Malhotra, so that he can get her married to Nitin Dharampal; Prominent businessman, Mahindra, would like to negotiate with his daughter, Sonu's kidnappers, and secure her release. And the Central Bureau of Investigation would like to protect the life of Chief Minister Gayetri Bachchan under the mission code-named "Maa", and the CBI Officer in Charge to be code-named "Baadshah". Now Baadshah happens to be a bumbling and out of work Private Investigator, who has agreed to assist Jhunjhunwala and Mahindra, and while doing so is mistaken for the CBI Agent, ends up working for the assassins, and must assassinate Gayetri or end up losing his team of four fellow-bumblers, and Mahindra's daughter. What results is hilarious chaos, with no one knowing what the other is doing, and each one being each other's suspect(s). To make matters worse Jhunjhunwala is not really Seema's dad, but someone else with an ulterior motive. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Mela
programme.desc: Roopa, a beautiful young village belle is much loved by the villagers of Chandanpur. Chandanpur celebrates a huge Mela every year and this year, they invite a Minister to inaugurate it. In an assassination attempt that follows, a massacre takes place. Chandanpur is devastated and Roopa's family gets wiped out. She vows revenge. Into her life enter two men, the gregarious Kishan and the volatile Shankar, causing much upheaval in their relationship. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Yeh Hai Mumbai Meri Jaan
programme.desc: Raju comes to Mumbai in search of a job and becomes a peon for a big firm. He soon discovers that certain people are scheming to make the company go bankrupt. (Action,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Taqdeer Ka Tamasha
programme.desc: A single mother, Geeta, must deal with her two sons, the elder a Police Inspector Suryapratap; while the younger, Satya, a hoodlum, when both get into conflicts. Things only get worse after Satya gets arrested, arguments ensue and he leaves. He gets hired by Sheshnaag for the sole purpose of exacting vengeance against his rival, Deva. Both brothers are fated to meet again when Suryapratap decides to accumulate evidence to arrest Deva. Neither of the brothers know that Deva has an alias, and is determined to thwart any attempt for revenge nor face any charges under the Indian Penal Code. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: China Gate
programme.desc: After witnessing the brutal slaying of her Forest Officer father, Sunder Rajan, at the hands of dreaded dacoit Jageera, Sandhya goes to Colonel Krishnakant Puri and asks for his assistance in bringing an end to Jageera's rule in the Devdurg region. Krishnakant agrees to assist her, and summons about a dozen of his fellow officers and subordinates to assist him. They all assemble at Devdurg with all the necessary ammunitions and arms to combat Jageera, not realizing that Jageera has influence over the local police detachment, who will prevent Puri and his men to possess any guns and weapons. This does not deter Puri and his men, and they continue to stay on in Devdurg and gain the confidence of the villagers. What the villagers do not know that Krishnakant and his men had all been dishonorably discharged from the army for cowardice and retreating when attacked by the enemy. Will Puri and his men abandon Devdurg and let history repeat itself? (Action,Adventure,Drama,Thriller,Western)

programme.title: Keemat
programme.desc: Agent 116 Gopal (Dharmendra) is assigned the case to solve the mystery behind the missing of young women in Bombay. (Thriller,Action)

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Dhadkan is about Anjali (Shilpa Shetty) who is a girl that hails from an extremely rich and influential family. Her father Mr. Chauhan (Kiran Kumar) is a renowned businessman and has many dreams for his daughter. But Anjali is in love with Dev (Sunil Shetty) who is very poor & often cannot even afford to clothe himself properly. Dev also loves Anjali, wants to marry her so has to meet her father. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Mr. Natwarlal
programme.desc: Mr. Natwarlal is a 1979 Hindi Action comedy movie. Produced by Tony Glaad it is directed by Rakesh Kumar. Natwar is just a young boy when his beloved older brother and caretaker, police officer Gridharilal (Ajit), is framed for bribery by sinister criminal mastermind Vikram (Amjad Khan). When he grows up, Natwar (Amitabh Bachchan) creates a secret identity for himself, posing as a powerful and mysterious underworld figure named Mr. Natwarlal, determined to slowly but surely exact vengeance on Vikram. - via Wikipedia ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mr._Natwarlal ) (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Gunaah
programme.desc: Tough cop Prabha (Bipasha Basu) is haunted by the demons of her past. Being an illegitimate daughter of a prostitute, she has had a very bad childhood and there once occurred an incident in her life when she was driven to the point of committing a murder. But today, now that she is a cop, she believes that she can clear her conscience by reforming a criminal. Prabha's life is turned topsy-turvy with the entry of Aditya (Dino Morea), who is a good person at heart but was forced to take the path of crime due to the wrong doing of the system. Prabha goes to Aditya's house to nab him, but gets carried away when she sees him bathing. Aditya slips from under her vigilant eyes and a hasty chase follows. Prabha stays close on the heels of fleeing Aditya. At one point when she is about to fall off the rooftop Aditya stops running and extends his hand to save her. This act makes a great impact on Prabha. Prabha decides to know Aditya's past and find out what prompted him to commit crime in the first place. She decides to reform him but herself gets 'reformed' into loving him in the process. (Drama)

programme.title: Sultanat
programme.desc: After his wife dies in childbirth as the result of an unsuccessful coup attempt by the bandit Razoulli (Amrish Puri), Gen. Khalid (Dharmendra) vows to avenge her death in this Bollywood thriller. But as he prepares to carry out his plan against Razoulli's son (Sunny Deol) years later, little does Khalid know that the two are connected by a long-buried secret. Sridevi, Karan Kapoor and Juhi Chawla also star. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Juaari
programme.desc: Vijay, a young man, resorts to gambling to free his lover, Shanti, whom Sanga holds captive, but he soon runs out of luck and gets arrested. (Family)

programme.title: Gurudev
programme.desc: Inspector Dev Kumar and Gaurav alias Guru are childhood friends. The problem is that while Dev Kumar is with the police, his dad, Parshu Ram, works with the underworld, and is the right-hand man of Kakhan, a criminal don, who is also Guru's dad. When Inspector Khan is assigned the case of apprehending Kakhan, his first suspect is none other than Dev himself, and Dev must prove to Khan that he is earnest, and will not hesitate to arrest Kakhan. It remains to be seen if Dev will really apprehend his friend's dad, or just play around without really getting anywhere. (Romance)

programme.title: Mela
programme.desc: Roopa, a beautiful young village belle is much loved by the villagers of Chandanpur. Chandanpur celebrates a huge Mela every year and this year, they invite a Minister to inaugurate it. In an assassination attempt that follows, a massacre takes place. Chandanpur is devastated and Roopa's family gets wiped out. She vows revenge. Into her life enter two men, the gregarious Kishan and the volatile Shankar, causing much upheaval in their relationship. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Pardesi Babu
programme.desc: Pardesi Babu 1998 (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Saaya
programme.desc: Tanya is a rich woman who is married to another rich man named Vinod. But their lives change by Vinod's death. Tanya than starts falling in love with a doctor named Akash. But Akash is in love with a woman named Maya and after some time gets married to her. But their marriage does not last long. Because, first Maya leaves him to travel to another part of India to help people who are sick; and then Akash receives news that she is dead. Tanya comes up to console Akash and hopes that he will now love, accept and marry her. But Akash does not do so, as he is still immersed in Maya's memories, and believes that Maya is still alive and calling out to him. Is Akash going out of his mind? (Horror,Mystery,Romance)

programme.title: Samurai The Warrior
programme.desc: Based on a true historic figure, Yamada Nagamasa, a Japanese adventurer who went to Ayothaya in the 16th century and became a soldier in King Naresuan's army. After the war in Burma it's restless in Ayothaya, because of a mysterious group of men that terrorizes and plunders the city. Yamada goes after them and discovers that the men are rebelious Japanese samurai. Now he has to fight his own countrymen. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Daraar
programme.desc: Raj Malhotra lives with his mother, and comes from a very wealthy family. He meets Priya Bhatia, who works with a real estate agency, and instantly falls in love with her. (Thriller,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Ghatak: Lethal
programme.desc: A small town in Bombay is brutally subdued by a notorious gangster named Katya and his brothers. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Loha
programme.desc: Honest and diligent Police Inspector Amar lives a middle-classed lifestyle in Bombay. In his attempt to arrest bandit Sher Singh, he and Inspector Dayal are attacked, Amar survives, but Dayal gets his legs crushed under a truck and becomes wheelchair-bound. Subsequently, Amar arrests local politician, Jagannath Prasad, who not only gets released without getting charged but Amar gets reprimanded, and decides to resign. Shortly thereafter, Sher Singh hijacks a bus and holds the passengers in exchange for 25 of his jailed associates. Dayal's granddaughter, Seema, is amongst them, and Dayal asks Amar for assistance. Amar, along with ex-convict, Qasim Ali, and Karan, a drug-dealer, does manage to rescue them but differences crop up between the trio and they part ways. Then Amar finds out that Qasim and Karan have masterminded a plan to facilitate the escape of the 25 convicts, and decides to confront them. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Dhadkan is about Anjali (Shilpa Shetty) who is a girl that hails from an extremely rich and influential family. Her father Mr. Chauhan (Kiran Kumar) is a renowned businessman and has many dreams for his daughter. But Anjali is in love with Dev (Sunil Shetty) who is very poor & often cannot even afford to clothe himself properly. Dev also loves Anjali, wants to marry her so has to meet her father. programme.desc: K. Jhunjhunwala would like to locate his missing/runaway daughter, Seema Malhotra, so that he can get her married to Nitin Dharampal; Prominent businessman, Mahindra, would like to negotiate with his daughter, Sonu's kidnappers, and secure her release. And the Central Bureau of Investigation would like to protect the life of Chief Minister Gayetri Bachchan under the mission code-named "Maa", and the CBI Officer in Charge to be code-named "Baadshah". Now Baadshah happens to be a bumbling and out of work Private Investigator, who has agreed to assist Jhunjhunwala and Mahindra, and while doing so is mistaken for the CBI Agent, ends up working for the assassins, and must assassinate Gayetri or end up losing his team of four fellow-bumblers, and Mahindra's daughter. What results is hilarious chaos, with no one knowing what the other is doing, and each one being each other's suspect(s). To make matters worse Jhunjhunwala is not really Seema's dad, but someone else with an ulterior motive. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Nazar
programme.desc: Bombay Police are baffled when several bar girls and prostitutes are found brutally murdered by a scalpel.

programme.title: Kaun Kare Kurbanie
programme.desc: After his transfer from Delhi, Inspector Arjun Singh lives in Bombay along with his wife, Anita, school-going son, Munna; and a younger collegian brother, Ajit. Arjun is disappointed with Ajit as he spends most of his time singing, dancing and flirting with girls. Then a series of sexual molestations and killings of attractive bikini-clad young women take place, and Arjun is assigned to this case. After a short period of time, his investigations lead him to a wealthy suspect, but when the suspect's daughter is molested and killed, his department gets evidence that may implicate another suspect - none other than Ajit. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Mohabbat Ki Arzoo
programme.desc: Orphaned Motor Mechanic Raja (Rishi Kapoor) likes to live it up on pay-day, which is the first of every month, and behaves like a very rich man, in a borrowed garage car. One such day he gives a lift to Poonam Singh (Zeba Bakhtiar) who is stranded on a wet rainy night. He introduces himself as a wealthy man, and she introduces herself as a poor school-teahcer, not knowing that both are deceiving each other. Both meet on several occasions, and fall in love. Raja tells her that he is a motor mechanic, and she tells him that she is the city's richest man's, Rai Bahadur Mahendra Pratap Singh's (Mukesh Khanna) daughter. Rai Bahadur is enraged at the very thought of his daughter marrying a motor mechanic, and decides to marry his daughter off to his friend, Dr. Anand's (Kader Khan) only son, Amar. The pleas of his daughter and Raja fall on deaf ears, and no one can stop Rai Bahadur from doing what he has always wanted to do - on his own terms. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Loh Purush
programme.desc: Ajit Singh is the bodyguard of CM Gayatri Devi. When Bhola Pandey, her rival, kills her daughter, Ajit is wrongly accused. He escapes and finds the murderer and learns that the next target is the CM. (Action)

programme.title: Kanoon Ki Awaaz
programme.desc: Darshall Lall is a gangster with many political connections. And it is for this reason that no police officer has dared to arrest Lall or any of his men. But when Public Prosecutor, Janki Rai's rickshaw-driver husband, Raghunath Prasad Rai, witnesses Lall's son, Surendra Pal, kill Ram Mohan Tripathi, Lall's son is arrested and brought before the court. Lall's offer to bribe Janki are in vain, and as a result Surendra is convicted and sentenced to die. Lall swears to break up the Rai to avenge the death of his son, and finds out that Raghunath could be brought with money, and he induces him as such, and inducts him in a life of crime. Money and an easy life corrupt Raghunath and he takes to coming home late, and drinking alcohol. One day Raghunath is arrested by the police and held for a court hearing. During that night Lall arranges his escape, however, Raghunath's car meets with an accident, and he dies, leaving Janki widowed and to single-handedly bring up Raghunath's younger brother, Sunil. She ensures Sunil gets a good education and after several years he becomes a police officer. His superiors are impressed with his performance and assign him a special case of stopping smuggling activities, which Sunil accepts with great pride. What Sunil does not know that the smugglers he is attempting to arrest are headed by none other than Darshal Lall, who also has an unpleasant surprise awaiting him. (Action,Crime)

When their mom become seriously ill, they do not have money to pay for her medicines, Raja steals some money much to the chagrin of Vijay, who beats him and asks him to leave, but he is unable to save his mother. He decides to return the stolen money but finds the recipient, also named Vijay, has killed himself, leaving behind his near-destitute mother and a sister, Shalu. When told about her son's passing, the mother has a seizure and is hospitalized. When she recovers Vijay decides to not tell her about her son's passing and becomes her son instead. He joins the army and becomes a Commando. He single=handedly captures a terrorist, Master D.D., and holds him in a cell. Vijay then meets with Mohini and gets married to her. What Vijay does not know is that Master D.D. is but a mere pawn, the real kingpin behind this gang is an unknown assailant known only as Kaali Topi Laal Rumaal; that Raja, who has taken to petty crime as a career, is part of this gang and had accepted an assignment to abduct Shalu; and to complicate Vijay's life even more the Indian Army comes across evidence linking Mohini with D.D.'s gang. programme.title: ACP Shiva
programme.desc: Shivakumar, a dishonest cop, ensures that he is transferred to Chennai, where he exploits his position for financial gain. He also supports GK, a local MP, against the commissioner of Chennai. (Action)

programme.title: Policewala Gunda 2
programme.desc: The adopted son of a goon decides to reform him, after he becomes a responsible policeman. (Thriller,Action,Drama)

programme.title: Kapoor & Sons
programme.desc: A story revolving around a dysfunctional family of two brothers who visit their parents and grandfather in Coonoor, and end up falling for the same woman. (Drama)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: After getting released for serving a double life sentence, Sachidanandan returns to connect and live with his family until his past catches up to him, forcing him to protect his loved ones. (Action,Thriller)

programme.title: Main Hoon Na
programme.desc: An army major goes undercover as a college student. His mission is both professional and personal: to protect his general's daughter from a radical militant, and to find his estranged half-brother. (Drama)

programme.title: The Body
programme.desc: When the body of a powerful businesswoman goes missing from the morgue, the inspector-in-charge hunts for the truth. When he questions her husband he realizes that there is much more to the case than meets the eye. (Thriller,Mystery)

programme.title: Main Insaaf Karoonga
programme.desc: Surya is a gym coach and he is very close to Sri and his family. Murthy is Sri’s father and Meghana is his sister. Surya is a man who fights against any injustice he comes across and this brings him into direct conflict with Raja Goud. In a separate track, Sriram gets into major trouble in Saudi Arabia and Ravi Teja must do everything he can to save his friend’s life. In a curious twist of fate, only Raja Goud has the ability to save Sriram from certain death. Will Surya enter into a compromise with Raja Goud? How can Raja Goud save a man in trouble in Saudi Arabia? That forms the story (Drama,Comedy)

programme.title: Crazy Singh
programme.desc: Bittu, a village simpleton, falls in love with a modern Saumya. Chaos ensues when their contrasting families meet to fix their marriage. (Comedy)

programme.title: Siddhart
programme.desc: Surya (Sagar) arrives in Malaysia to live in peace away from the factional feud triggered by the murder of his father (Nagineedu) and the avenging of the same by Surya. Vikram (Ajay), whose father was murdered by the hero, is boiling with rage. Surya decides to move on and it's then when he comes across Sahasra (Ragini Nandwani), a happy-go-lucky RJ. (Action)

programme.title: Krishna Ka Badla
programme.desc: Krishnam Vande Jagathgurum is a action drama based movie with a mining mafia as backdrop. In which, Rana Daggubati plays a role of B.Tech Babu. Nayanatara playing a role of Devika. Award wining director Krish Jagarlamudi directing this movie. J. Sai Babu and Y.Rajeev Reddy are jointly producing this movie. Mani Sharma has composed the music. (Action)

programme.title: Maa Tujhe Salaam
programme.desc: Bollywood superstar Sunny Deol plays Maj. Pratap Singh, who's in command of an Indian battalion guarding his country's border with Pakistan in this action-packed thriller from director Tinnu Verma. When Singh's girlfriend -- intelligence agent Sonia Khanna (Tabu) -- informs him that self-styled Pakistani leader Lala aims to rule Kashmir as a sovereign state, Singh finds an unexpected ally in a mercenary (Arbaaz Khan) once loyal to Lala. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Power Unlimited 2
programme.desc: A businessman devoted to his family decides to take matters into his own hands after his sister witnesses a murder. Soon, secrets involving his past life come to light. (Action)

programme.title: Uu Kodathara Ulikki Padathara
programme.desc: Uu... Kodathara? Ulikki Padathara?, commonly referred to as UKUP, is a 2012 Indian Telugu socio-fantasy film written and directed by Sekhar Raja, produced by Lakshmi Manchu and starring Manoj Manchu (Action)

programme.title: Speedunnodu
programme.desc: Speedunnodu is a remake of the Tamil hit film - Sundarapandian. The film is a romantic comedy about a young man and the girl he is trying to woo for his friend. (Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Pogaru
programme.desc: Shiva, a ruffian, is the terror of his area in many ways, but still has a heart of gold. He has just one wish, for his mother to love him wholly like the way he does. (Action)

programme.title: Temper
programme.desc: A corrupt police officer who works for an influential smuggler finds his life changing when he falls in love with a woman who leads him towards the right path of justice. (Action)

programme.title: Ek Aur Rakshak
programme.desc: A soon to-be married bride is abducted by a man who is obsessed with her. (Drama)

programme.title: Neevevaro
programme.desc: As Kalyan, a blind chef and Vennela, who comes visiting him at his restaurant, fall in love and start making plans for their future, Vennela goes missing. Series of unexpected and shocking events follow. (Thriller,Romance)

programme.title: House No. 13
programme.desc: Movie starring Arjun and Gayatri. (Drama)

programme.title: Yaarana
programme.desc: Yaarana is a 1981 Indian film directed by Rakesh Kumar and starring Amitabh Bachchan, Amjad Khan, Neetu Singh, Tanuja and Kader Khan. This was one of the films where Amjad Khan plays a positive role. Nearly all of his other films with Amitabh Bachchan have been where he plays a villain role. This movie became a hit at the box office. One of the plus points of the film was its music by Rajesh Roshan and lyrics by Anjaan. At least three songs "Chhookar Mere Mann Ko", "Tere Jaisa Yaar Kahan", "Saara Zamana" and "Haseeno Ka Deewana" were superhit songs and still liked. (Drama,Musical,Romance,Action)

programme.title: Barsaat Ki Ek Raat
programme.desc: In a small village in Darjeeling, Sahuji (Utpal Dutt) the merchant has weaved a web of corruption in every layers of the social fabric. And he is also involved in rampant smuggling of goods across the border, and everyone from the local jeweler to the local police inspector are part of his intricate web. While the father has created a position of influence by spreading corruption, his son Kaaliram (Amjad Khan) has ushered in a reign of terror. Desperate villagers make a plea to the owner of the tea garden, who calls (presumably) the higher ups in police force and they promise to send someone. (Romance,Drama)

programme.title: Parvarish
programme.desc: A policeman adopts the son of a bandit. A misunderstanding leads the officer's own biological son to believe he is the bandit's son and he takes up a secret life of crime; meanwhile, the adopted son becomes an officer of the law. (Action)

programme.title: Pukar
programme.desc: Although India obtained freedom from the British in 1947, Goa and it's territories are still ruled by the Portuguese. A group of revolutionaries want a free Goa and are thus wanted by the Portuguese administration. Amongst them are Purandare, Narvekar, and Dinanath, and when Dinanath's whereabouts are known to the police, he escapes with his young son, Ramdas, and goes to their hideout. With the assistance of Purandare they do manage to escape but are shot. A horrified Ramdas watches as his dad is shot dead by Purandare. This is how Ramdas starts hating revolutionaries. Ramdas changes his name to Ronnie, befriends a girl named Julie, and grows up taking to crime as his career. Written by rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com) (Action,Drama,Musical)

programme.title: Manzil
programme.desc: Ajay Chandra, a hard working and ambitious young man, who dreams of bigger things than a small job. He has dreams of starting his own business. One day he meets Aruna at a friends wedding and slowly fall in love. Aruna is daughter of a very successful lawyer. Ajay uses his rich friend's car, apartment etc. to impress Aruna's family, in the hope that he will succeed in his own business before they are married. However, Ajay falls prey to the cut throat competion in business and loses all his investment. He discloses everything to Aruna. Aruna is sympathetic to Ajay and loves him for what he is. However, Aruna's lawyer dad turns down the marriage proposal and starts to prosecute Ajay for business fraud. Through his hard work and support from Aruna and his mother, Ajay is able to correct the wrong doings and is able to win over Aruna's father. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: Entertainment-based programme. (Entertainment)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: Entertainment-based programme. (Entertainment)

programme.title: Milan
programme.desc: On the banks of the holy River Ganga, Gopi, a ferryman conducts an unconsummated romance with Radha, a girl from the upper classes. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Shankar Shambhu
programme.desc: Inspector Ranjit Singh lives a middle-classed lifestyle along with his wife, Laxmi, a son, Pappu, and daughter, Pinky. When the National Bank is broken into one night, he gives chase to the robbers, and shoots one of them dead. The dead robber's brother, Kundan, manages to get away with the loot, then tracks down Ranjit and his family, shoots at them, forcing their jeep to fall into the Narbada river, separating the entire family. Ranjit manages to rescue Laxmi, and then apprehends Kundan, has him tried in Court, and sentenced to jail for several years, but is unable to recover the stolen loot. Years later, Kundan gets discharged and is received by his nephew, Chaman. Ranjit is now the Inspector General of Police, and Laxmi still hopes to be reunited with her children. Pappu has been adopted by a bandit named Lakhan Singh, who re-names him Shambhu, and brings him up with his other son, Shankar. (Action,Drama,Crime)

programme.title: Benaam Badsha
programme.desc: Found in a garbage bin, abandoned by his biological parents, a young man grows up to a paid assasin, kidnapper, and rapist (Anil Kapoor). One of his rape victims' is Jyoti (Juhi Chawla), who is raped on the day of her marriage to a doctor groom. Her life ruined, unwed, she decides to convince her rapist to marry her, and goes to live in his neighborhood. But her rapist will not marry her, however, she continues to pursue her goal, and after feigning a pregnancy she does convince him to allow her to move in with him - amongst ruins, without a roof. She soon starts to transform him, with considerable success. She names him Deepak, so that he has a name others can call him by. Deepak receives a contract to kill Kaameshwari (Rohini Hattangadi) by Jaikal (Amrish Puri). (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Himmat Aur Mehnat
programme.desc: Nurse Jyoti gets hired by a wealthy male, Madan, wins his confidence, and is permitted to virtually run the entire household. When Madan's son, Vijay Kumar, returns from New York, he sexually molests then eventually marries her. Then differences arise between her and Madan, and despite of the birth of a son, escalate to the point when Madan and Vijay both accuse her of having an affair with another male, leaving her no choice but to leave the household. Vijay has a change of heart and goes to visit his son and estranged wife, but is shocked to find that they are not alone, and she has sired another son. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
programme.desc: A gangster sets out to fulfill his father's dream of becoming a doctor. (Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Asli Naqli
programme.desc: A 1986 Hindi film. A couple were separated from their son at an early age. They know he has a locket around his neck with which they hope to one day find him again.

programme.title: Angaaray
programme.desc: Inspector Amar, who was convicted for attacking a man with a knife in his childhood, is ordered by the Police Commissioner, Vinod Talwar, to find the murderer of a businessman, Khanna. (Drama)

programme.title: Kanchana
programme.desc: Raghava, a young man was possessed by an evil spirit and all hell breaks loose. (Comedy,Crime,Horror,Thriller)

programme.title: Jaan Ki Baazi
programme.desc: Chandru, a jobless man, vows to get a job after the father of his girlfriend opposes their relationship. His joy on getting a job in an Islamic nation ends when he is nabbed there for carrying drugs. (Action)

programme.title: Raj Mahal 3
programme.desc: A rich man decides to do away with the middle-class guy whom his daughter loves by inviting the guy's family to a palatial house on the pretence of marriage. What he doesn't know is that the place is haunted by a fearsome ghost. (Comedy,Horror)

programme.title: Kaithi
programme.desc: A prisoner on parole, who’s on his way to meet his daughter, is enlisted by an injured police officer to protect a few cops. With the entire lot of gangsters in the place after them, can the prisoner save the day? (Action,Thriller)

programme.title: Hate Story IV
programme.desc: Tasha, who aspires to make it big in life, catches the eye of two womanising brothers, who promise to make her a star. Yet her hidden intentions may prove deadly for the duo. (Thriller,Crime)

programme.title: Accident On Hill Road
programme.desc: Accident on Hill Road is a cunning and energetic thriller that takes its premise from the real-life incident of a woman who hit a man, then drove home and parked the car in the garage with the man wedged halfway through her windshield. Celina Jaitly stars as Sonam Chopra, a hard-partying, overworked nursing assistant in this delicious, darkly humorous psychological thriller. (Thriller)

programme.title: Kill Dil
programme.desc: The cast members speak about the plot and making of a movie and share their on-set experiences and behind-the-scenes footage. (Entertainment)

programme.title: Kill Dil
programme.desc: The cast members speak about the plot and making of a movie and share their on-set experiences and behind-the-scenes footage. (Entertainment)

programme.title: Setters
programme.desc: A thriller set in Benares, Jaipur, Mumbai and Delhi, Setters is about a racket profiteering from academic scams. The film follows a cat-and-mouse game between two good friends: one a cop, and the other a "setter" who arranges brilliant students in place of weak students to appear in examinations. (Crime,Thriller)

programme.title: Diljale Khiladi
programme.desc: An engineering graduate with a loving family and a caring lover, decides to go against a vindictive politician and his son who threaten to hurt his loved ones. (Thriller,Family,Action)

programme.title: Rowdy Hero 2
programme.desc: A young politician finds himself in a position where he has to contest against his girlfriend, who is ambitious. Circumstances force his look-alike twin to also get involved in this political battle. (Romance,Action,Drama)

programme.title: Kabir Singh
programme.desc: Kabir Singh, a short-tempered house surgeon gets used to drugs and drinks when his girlfriend is forced to marry the other person. (Drama,Action,Romance)

programme.title: Tik Tik Tik
programme.desc: The Indian Space Research Organisation recruits Vasu on a special mission. He along with his team must stop an asteroid, advancing towards Earth, from causing damage and destruction. (Sci-fi)

programme.title: Heart Attack
programme.desc: A romantic drama which aims to allure the urban crowd, stars Nithiin Reddy and Adah Sharma. With a tagline `I need one hour kiss to burn 300 calories` - that suggests the film is high on romantic quotient (Romance,Action)

programme.title: Valeba Raja
programme.desc: When Karthik confesses to Shalu that he loved Sweety in the past, she gives him 15 days to decide whether to wed her. But his turmoil increases when Sweety re-enters his life. (Drama)

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: The seemingly invincible Spider-Man goes up against an all-new crop of villains -- including the shape-shifting Sandman -- in the third installment of this blockbusting comic book adventure series. While Spidey's superpowers are altered by an alien organism, his alter ego, Peter Parker, deals with nemesis Eddie Brock and gets caught up in a love triangle. (Fantasy,Action,Adventure)

programme.title: Bhai
programme.desc: Kundan, a simple village boy, comes to the city with his younger brother to earn a living. However, fate compels him to take a few erroneous steps that end up making him a notorious gangster. (Action)
